long_description: Six Super Trout catching lures in this variety pack:  #2 Silver/Orange Fly,    #2 Rainbow Trout Undressed,  #2 Copper Yellow,  #4 Spotted Sea Trout,  #4 Salamander Silver,  #4 Regular Fly Gold/Black. All proven Trout catchers!
